Artist Icons

Release dates:

Episodes 1-2: 17th February 2023
Episode 3: 21st February 2023

This radio show was released through BBC Sounds as part of their Artist Icons series. The first episode features Damon Albarn & Remi Kabaka playing songs by various Gorillaz collaborators, while the second episode features Jo Whiley telling the band’s history with several of their live performances played throughout; the third episode features Fraser T Smith playing his favourite Gorillaz songs.

Episodes:

For Fans of Gorillaz… with Damon Albarn and Remi Kabaka
Gorillaz at the BBC
Gorillaz and Me with Fraser T Smith
